title: SOLD: 1908 PC760 Rose Co. Postcard Jack Warner
author: Baseball Rarities

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1908 PC760 Rose Co. Postcard Jack Warner
posts.post_content:
$475 delivered via the USPS in the US. Paypal, Venmo or a check is fine.

There is a pinhole in the upper left corner. The bottom right has two pinholes along with a very small edge tear. Otherwise, it is a very clean example.

The postcard has been sold.
